titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: For a Christian bishop to be devoting Lent to the study of Byron's poems and letters is a proceeding entirely congruous with All Fools' Day.

We motored to Sunderland, and in S. Luke's Church I confirmed 68 candidates. On the whole I was better pleased then I expected to be, for the parishes represented were some of the least satisfactory in the diocese.
